name: Status

question: What is the total CPU usage on a node?

name: Available

name: Total OSDs
description: This PromQL query measures the total number of OSDs (Object Storage Daemons) in a Ceph cluster.
question: What is the total number of OSDs currently up in the Ceph cluster?

name: Total OSDs
description: This PromQL query measures the total number of OSDs (Object Storage Daemons) in a Ceph cluster.
question: How many OSDs are in a working state?

description: This PromQL query measures the total number of OSDs (Object Storage Daemons) in a Ceph cluster.
question: What is the overall count of OSDs running in the cluster?

name: PGs
description: This PromQL query measures the number of PGs (Placement Groups) within a storage cluster.
question: How many PGs are currently active?

name: PGs
description: This PromQL query measures the number of PGs (Placement Groups) within a storage cluster.

name: PGs
description: This PromQL query measures the number of PGs (Placement Groups) within a storage cluster.
